document_notes.text:
This update for php74 fixes the following issues:
  
- CVE-2024-2756: Fixed bypass of security fix applied for CVE-2022-31629 that lead PHP to consider not secure cookies as secure (bsc#1222857)
- CVE-2024-3096: Fixed bypass on null byte leading passwords checked via password_verify (bsc#1222858)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Due to an incomplete fix to  CVE-2022-31629 https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c43m-486j-j32p , network and same-site attackers can set a standard insecure cookie in the victim's browser which is treated as a __Host- or __Secure- cookie by PHP applications.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: In PHP  version 8.1.* before 8.1.28, 8.2.* before 8.2.18, 8.3.* before 8.3.5, if a password stored with password_hash() starts with a null byte (\x00), testing a blank string as the password via password_verify() will incorrectly return true.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
